verses.verse: And it came <S%G1096><s%> about that while <S%G1722><s%> He was praying <S%G4336><s%> in a certain <S%G5100><s%> place, <S%G5117><s%> after <S%G5613><s%> He had finished, <S%G3973><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> of His disciples <S%G3101><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> teach <S%G1321><s%> us to pray <S%G4336><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as John <S%G2491><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> his disciples. <S%G3101><s%>"

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, " When <S%G3752><s%> you pray, <S%G4336><s%> say: <S%G3004><s%> 'Father, <S%G3962><s%> hallowed <S%G37><s%> be Thy name. <S%G3686><s%> Thy kingdom <S%G932><s%> come. <S%G2064><s%>
'Give <S%G1325><s%> us each <S%G2596><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> our daily <S%G1967><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>

'And forgive <S%G863><s%> us our sins, <S%G266><s%> For we ourselves <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> everyone <S%G3956><s%> who is indebted <S%G3784><s%> to us. And lead <S%G1533><s%> us not into temptation. <S%G3986><s%>' "

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Suppose <S%G5101><s%> one <S%G5101><s%> of you shall have <S%G2192><s%> a friend, <S%G5384><s%> and shall go <S%G4198><s%> to him at midnight, <S%G3317><s%> and say <S%G3004><s%> to him, 'Friend, <S%G5384><s%> lend <S%G5531><s%> me three <S%G5140><s%> loaves; <S%G740><s%>

for a friend <S%G5384><s%> of mine <S%G1473><s%> has come <S%G3854><s%> to me from a journey, <S%G3598><s%> and I have <S%G2192><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> to set <S%G3908><s%> before <S%G3908><s%> him';

and from inside <S%G2081><s%> he shall answer <S%G611><s%> and say, <S%G3004><s%> 'Do not bother <S%G2873><s%> <S%G3930><s%> me; the door <S%G2374><s%> has already <S%G2235><s%> been shut <S%G2808><s%> and my children <S%G3813><s%> and I are in bed; <S%G2845><s%> I cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> get <S%G450><s%> up and give <S%G1325><s%> you [anything.]'

"I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, even <S%G2532><s%> though <S%G1487><s%> he will not get <S%G450><s%> up and give <S%G1325><s%> him [anything] because <S%G1223><s%> he is his friend, <S%G5384><s%> yet <S%G1065><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of his persistence <S%G335><s%> he will get <S%G1453><s%> up and give <S%G1325><s%> him as much <S%G3745><s%> as he needs. <S%G5535><s%>

"And I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, ask, <S%G154><s%> and it shall be given <S%G1325><s%> to you; seek, <S%G2212><s%> and you shall find; <S%G2147><s%> knock, <S%G2925><s%> and it shall be opened <S%G455><s%> to you.
"For everyone <S%G3956><s%> who asks, <S%G154><s%> receives; <S%G2983><s%> and he who seeks, <S%G2212><s%> finds; <S%G2147><s%> and to him who knocks, <S%G2925><s%> it shall be opened. <S%G455><s%>

"Now <S%G1161><s%> suppose <S%G5101><s%> one <S%G5101><s%> of you fathers <S%G3962><s%> is asked <S%G154><s%> by his son <S%G5207><s%> for a fish; <S%G2486><s%> he will not give <S%G1929><s%> him a snake <S%G3789><s%> instead <S%G473><s%> of a fish, <S%G2486><s%> will he?
"Or <S%G2228><s%> [if] he is asked <S%G154><s%> for an egg, <S%G5609><s%> he will not give <S%G1929><s%> him a scorpion, <S%G4651><s%> will he?

"If <S%G1487><s%> you then, <S%G3767><s%> being <S%G5225><s%> evil, <S%G4190><s%> know <S%G3609><s%> how <S%G3609><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> good <S%G18><s%> gifts <S%G1390><s%> to your children, <S%G5043><s%> how <S%G4214><s%> much <S%G4214><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> shall [your] heavenly <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3772><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who ask <S%G154><s%> Him?"

And He was casting <S%G1544><s%> out a demon, <S%G1140><s%> and it was dumb; <S%G2974><s%> and it came <S%G1096><s%> about that when the demon <S%G1140><s%> had gone <S%G1831><s%> out, the dumb <S%G2974><s%> man <S%G2974><s%> spoke; <S%G2980><s%> and the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> marveled. <S%G2296><s%>
But some <S%G5100><s%> of them said, <S%G3004><s%> "He casts <S%G1544><s%> out demons <S%G1140><s%> by Beelzebul, <S%G954><s%> the ruler <S%G758><s%> of the demons. <S%G1140><s%>"
And others, <S%G2087><s%> to test <S%G3985><s%> [Him,] were demanding <S%G2212><s%> of Him a sign <S%G4592><s%> from heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

But He knew <S%G3609><s%> their thoughts, <S%G1270><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Any <S%G3956><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> divided <S%G1266><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> itself <S%G1438><s%> is laid <S%G2049><s%> waste; <S%G2049><s%> and a house <S%G3624><s%> [divided] against <S%G1909><s%> itself <S%G3624><s%> falls. <S%G4098><s%>

"And if <S%G1487><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> is divided <S%G1266><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> shall his kingdom <S%G932><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%>? For you say <S%G3004><s%> that I cast <S%G1544><s%> out demons <S%G1140><s%> by Beelzebul. <S%G954><s%>

"And if <S%G1487><s%> I by Beelzebul <S%G954><s%> cast <S%G1544><s%> out demons, <S%G1140><s%> by whom <S%G5101><s%> do your sons <S%G5207><s%> cast <S%G1544><s%> them out? Consequently <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3778><s%> they shall be your judges. <S%G2923><s%>

"But if <S%G1487><s%> I cast <S%G1544><s%> out demons <S%G1140><s%> by the finger <S%G1147><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> then <S%G686><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> has come <S%G5348><s%> upon you.

"When <S%G3752><s%> a strong <S%G2478><s%> [man,] fully <S%G2528><s%> armed, <S%G2528><s%> guards <S%G5442><s%> his own <S%G1438><s%> homestead, <S%G833><s%> his possessions <S%G5225><s%> are undisturbed <S%G1722><s%>; <S%G1515><s%>

but when <S%G1875><s%> someone stronger <S%G2478><s%> than he attacks <S%G1904><s%> him and overpowers <S%G3528><s%> him, he takes <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> from him all <S%G3833><s%> his armor <S%G3833><s%> on which <S%G3739><s%> he had relied, <S%G3982><s%> and distributes <S%G1239><s%> his plunder. <S%G4661><s%>
"He who is not with Me is against <S%G2596><s%> Me; and he who does not gather <S%G4863><s%> with Me, scatters. <S%G4650><s%>

"When <S%G3752><s%> the unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> goes <S%G1831><s%> out of a man, <S%G444><s%> it passes <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> waterless <S%G504><s%> places <S%G5117><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> rest, <S%G372><s%> and not finding <S%G2147><s%> any, it says, <S%G3004><s%> 'I will return <S%G5290><s%> to my house <S%G3624><s%> from which <S%G3606><s%> I came. <S%G1831><s%>'
"And when it comes, <S%G2064><s%> it finds <S%G2147><s%> it swept <S%G4563><s%> and put <S%G2885><s%> in order. <S%G2885><s%>

"Then <S%G5119><s%> it goes <S%G4198><s%> and takes <S%G3880><s%> [along] seven <S%G2033><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%> more <S%G4190><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> than itself, <S%G1438><s%> and they go <S%G1525><s%> in and live <S%G2730><s%> there; <S%G1563><s%> and the last <S%G2078><s%> state of that man <S%G444><s%> becomes <S%G1096><s%> worse <S%G5501><s%> than the first. <S%G4413><s%>"

And it came <S%G1096><s%> about while <S%G1722><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things, <S%G3778><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> of the women <S%G1135><s%> in the crowd <S%G3793><s%> raised <S%G1869><s%> her voice, <S%G5456><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is the womb <S%G2836><s%> that bore <S%G941><s%> You, and the breasts <S%G3149><s%> at which <S%G3739><s%> You nursed. <S%G2337><s%>"

But He said, <S%G3004><s%> "On the contrary, <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3767><s%> blessed <S%G3107><s%> are those <S%G3588><s%> who hear <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and observe <S%G5442><s%> it."

And as the crowds <S%G3793><s%> were increasing, <S%G1865><s%> He began <S%G757><s%> to say, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> is a wicked <S%G4190><s%> generation; <S%G1074><s%> it seeks <S%G2212><s%> for a sign, <S%G4592><s%> and [yet] no <S%G3756><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> shall be given <S%G1325><s%> to it but the sign <S%G4592><s%> of Jonah. <S%G2495><s%>

"For just <S%G2531><s%> as Jonah <S%G2495><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> a sign <S%G4592><s%> to the Ninevites, <S%G3536><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> shall the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> be to this <S%G3778><s%> generation. <S%G1074><s%>

"The Queen <S%G938><s%> of the South <S%G3558><s%> shall rise <S%G1453><s%> up with the men <S%G435><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> at the judgment <S%G2920><s%> and condemn <S%G2632><s%> them, because <S%G3754><s%> she came <S%G2064><s%> from the ends <S%G4009><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of Solomon; <S%G4672><s%> and behold, <S%G2400><s%> something <S%G4183><s%> greater <S%G4183><s%> than Solomon <S%G4672><s%> is here. <S%G5602><s%>

"The men <S%G435><s%> of Nineveh <S%G3536><s%> shall stand <S%G450><s%> up with this <S%G3778><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> at the judgment <S%G2920><s%> and condemn <S%G2632><s%> it, because <S%G3754><s%> they repented <S%G3340><s%> at the preaching <S%G2782><s%> of Jonah; <S%G2495><s%> and behold, <S%G2400><s%> something <S%G4183><s%> greater <S%G4183><s%> than Jonah <S%G2495><s%> is here. <S%G5602><s%>

"No <S%G3762><s%> one, <S%G3762><s%> after lighting <S%G681><s%> a lamp, <S%G3088><s%> puts <S%G5087><s%> it away <S%G5087><s%> in a cellar, <S%G2926><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> a peck-measure, but on the lampstand, <S%G3087><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that those <S%G3588><s%> who enter <S%G1531><s%> may see <S%G991><s%> the light. <S%G5338><s%>

"The lamp <S%G3088><s%> of your body <S%G4983><s%> is your eye; <S%G3788><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> your eye <S%G3788><s%> is clear, <S%G573><s%> your whole <S%G3650><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> is full <S%G5460><s%> of light; <S%G5460><s%> but when <S%G1875><s%> it is bad, <S%G4190><s%> your body <S%G4983><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> is full <S%G4652><s%> of darkness. <S%G4652><s%>
"Then <S%G3767><s%> watch <S%G4648><s%> out that the light <S%G5457><s%> in you may not be darkness. <S%G4655><s%>

"If <S%G1487><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> your whole <S%G3650><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> is full <S%G5460><s%> of light, <S%G5460><s%> with no <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5100><s%> dark <S%G4652><s%> part <S%G3313><s%> in it, it shall be wholly <S%G3650><s%> illumined, <S%G5460><s%> as when <S%G3752><s%> the lamp <S%G3088><s%> illumines <S%G5461><s%> you with its rays. <S%G796><s%>"

Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G1722><s%> He had spoken, <S%G2980><s%> a Pharisee <S%G5330><s%> asked <S%G2065><s%> Him to have <S%G709><s%> lunch <S%G709><s%> with him; and He went <S%G1525><s%> in, and reclined <S%G377><s%> [at the table.]

And when the Pharisee <S%G5330><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> it, he was surprised <S%G2296><s%> that He had not first <S%G4413><s%> ceremonially <S%G907><s%> washed <S%G907><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the meal. <S%G712><s%>

But the Lord <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Now <S%G3568><s%> you Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> clean <S%G2511><s%> the outside <S%G1855><s%> of the cup <S%G4221><s%> and of the platter; <S%G4094><s%> but inside <S%G2081><s%> of you, you are full <S%G1073><s%> of robbery <S%G724><s%> and wickedness. <S%G4189><s%>
"You foolish <S%G878><s%> ones, <S%G878><s%> did not He who made <S%G4160><s%> the outside <S%G1855><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> the inside <S%G2081><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>?
"But give <S%G1325><s%> that which is within <S%G1751><s%> as charity, <S%G1654><s%> and then <S%G2400><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> are clean <S%G2513><s%> for you.

"But woe <S%G3759><s%> to you Pharisees! <S%G5330><s%> For you pay <S%G586><s%> tithe <S%G586><s%> of mint <S%G2238><s%> and rue <S%G4076><s%> and every <S%G3956><s%> [kind of] garden <S%G3001><s%> herb, <S%G3001><s%> and [yet] disregard <S%G3928><s%> justice <S%G2920><s%> and the love <S%G26><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> but these <S%G3778><s%> are the things <S%G3778><s%> you should <S%G1163><s%> have done <S%G4160><s%> without <S%G3361><s%> neglecting <S%G3935><s%> the others. <S%G2548><s%>

"Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you Pharisees! <S%G5330><s%> For you love <S%G25><s%> the front <S%G4410><s%> seats <S%G4410><s%> in the synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> and the respectful greetings <S%G783><s%> in the market <S%G58><s%> places. <S%G58><s%>

"Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you! For you are like <S%G5613><s%> concealed <S%G82><s%> tombs, <S%G3419><s%> and the people <S%G444><s%> who walk <S%G4043><s%> over <S%G1883><s%> [them] are unaware <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3609><s%> [of it.]"

And one <S%G5100><s%> of the lawyers <S%G3544><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him in reply, <S%G611><s%> "Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> when You say <S%G3004><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> You insult <S%G5195><s%> us too. <S%G2532><s%>"

But He said, <S%G3004><s%> "Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you lawyers <S%G3544><s%> as well! <S%G2532><s%> For you weigh <S%G5412><s%> men <S%G444><s%> down <S%G5412><s%> with burdens <S%G5413><s%> hard <S%G1419><s%> to bear, <S%G1419><s%> while <S%G2532><s%> you yourselves <S%G846><s%> will not even touch <S%G4379><s%> the burdens <S%G5413><s%> with one <S%G1520><s%> of your fingers. <S%G1147><s%>
"Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you! For you build <S%G3618><s%> the tombs <S%G3419><s%> of the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and [it was] your fathers <S%G3962><s%> [who] killed <S%G615><s%> them.

"Consequently, <S%G686><s%> you are witnesses <S%G3144><s%> and approve <S%G4909><s%> the deeds <S%G2041><s%> of your fathers; <S%G3962><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> it was they who killed <S%G615><s%> them, and you build <S%G3618><s%> [their tombs.]

"For this <S%G3778><s%> reason <S%G1223><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> 'I will send <S%G649><s%> to them prophets <S%G4396><s%> and apostles, <S%G652><s%> and [some] of them they will kill <S%G615><s%> and [some] they will persecute, <S%G1377><s%>

in order <S%G2443><s%> that the blood <S%G129><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> shed <S%G7062><s%> since <S%G575><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world, <S%G2889><s%> may be charged <S%G1567><s%> against <S%G575><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> generation, <S%G1074><s%>

from the blood <S%G129><s%> of Abel to the blood <S%G6><s%> of Zechariah, <S%G129><s%> who perished <S%G2197><s%> between <S%G622><s%> the altar <S%G3342><s%> and the house <S%G2379><s%> [of God;] yes, <S%G3624><s%> I tell <S%G3483><s%> you, it shall be charged <S%G3004><s%> against <S%G1567><s%> this <S%G575><s%> generation. <S%G3778><s%>'

"Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you lawyers! <S%G3544><s%> For you have taken <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> the key <S%G2807><s%> of knowledge; <S%G1108><s%> you did not enter <S%G1525><s%> in yourselves, <S%G846><s%> and those <S%G3588><s%> who were entering <S%G1525><s%> in you hindered. <S%G2967><s%>"

And when He left <S%G1831><s%> there, <S%G2547><s%> the scribes <S%G1122><s%> and the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> began <S%G757><s%> to be very <S%G1171><s%> hostile <S%G1758><s%> and to question <S%G653><s%> Him closely <S%G653><s%> on many <S%G4183><s%> subjects, <S%G4183><s%>
plotting <S%G1748><s%> against <S%G1748><s%> Him, to catch <S%G2340><s%> [Him] in something <S%G5100><s%> He might say. <S%G1537><s%> <S%G4750><s%>
